title: How do I now change my riot account name?
body:
So thanks for the really painfully shitty process of changing my account name. Where I got logged out several times immediately after logging into the process only to find that I can't keep my account name, nor the next few I wanted, so out of frustration typed some garbage into the name change field only to have it say, Congrats you've now changed  your account name.  No warning, no are you sure, no is that what  you really want.

So can someone tell me how to change my account name to something that isn't just frustrated venting?

Thanks.

PS. Still frustrated

replies.body: Mate,I am worse.Checkout what I post in "Help and support",I just got stuck in the cycle of account update confirmation forever.
